deathMsg: Strung upside down and slit open
Stabbed by a pitchfork through the neck
Chocked to death with a toilet brush

preStm.addUser: INSERT IGNORE INTO Mafia (`utc`,`username`,`role`) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `username`=`username`;
preStm.log: INSERT IGNORE INTO Log (`utc`,`username`,`action`) VALUES (%s, %s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `utc`=`utc`;
preStm.voteUser: INSERT INTO VoteCall (`username`, `vote`) VALUES(%s, %s) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `vote`=%s;
cycle: UPDATE Mafia SET `alive`='0' WHERE username IN (SELECT vote FROM VoteCall GROUP BY VOTE HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5)
SELECT alive, COUNT(alive) AS count FROM Mafia GROUP BY alive;
SELECT role, COUNT(role) AS count FROM Mafia WHERE `alive`='1' GROUP BY role;
SELECT vote,count(*) AS cnt FROM VoteCall GROUP BY vote HAVING cnt >= 5 ORDER BY cnt DESC;

reply.addUser:
Hello u/{} you have joined the game!

Your role is: *{}*.

SHHHH!!! Don't tell anyone!

You can leave the game by replying *!leave* to the game thread. **You cannot rejoin once the game has started!**
reply.removeUser: You have left the game. You can rejoin before the game starts.
reply.showHelp:
List of available commands:
* !digup USERNAME: Gather intelligence on a user. For Handlers and Analysts only.
* !help: Shows help.
* !join: Join the game. You cannot rejoin once the game has started
* !leave: Leave the game.
* !rules: Shows the rules.
* !stats
* !vote USERNAME: Vote on which user to be eliminated. For Assassins and Handlers only.
reply.showRules:
Rules:
1. Each user is given a secret role. You cannot see each otherâ€™s roles. You may choose to bluff or try to be truthful.
2. You must investigate each other to determine who is on what side.
3. During the Day, MI6 agents can investigate and kill users who they suspect are in The Twelve.
4. During the Night, The Twelve can investigate and kill users who they suspect are in MI6.
5. A user must receive at least 3 votes to be executed. Teams members are not immune to each other. You may end up killing your own team members out of suspicion.
6. At the end of each cycle, an announcement will be made how many people are alive how many were killed.
7. You must choose your allies carefully to seek out the enemy.
reply.voteUser: Your vote has been tallied. You can change your vote until the cycle ends.

err.cycle: You cannot vote at this time.
err.notFound: Cannot find user, the user is not playing in the game, or has been killed.
err.nmFmt: Invalid username. Do not include the `u/` prefix
err.role: You cannot use this command in this role.
err.spec: You are a spectator. You cannot use this command.
